project.name: Helios Datalake
project.scope: Unified ELT to Snowflake, dbt modeling, Kafka ingestion

sections.title: Project Context and Role
sections.goal: Establish the interviewee's role in Helios Datalake, their responsibilities, and familiarity with security policies.
sample_questions: Can you describe your primary responsibilities on the Helios Datalake project?
How do you ensure ELT pipelines meet our internal security policy POL-SEC-001?
What aspects of dbt modeling are most relevant to regulated industry compliance?

sections.title: Data Pipeline Security and Compliance
sections.goal: Assess understanding of secure ingestion, lineage, and compliance with SLA-HEL-01.
sample_questions: How do you handle sensitive data ingestion through Kafka while maintaining least privilege?
Describe how RB-ING-042 Ingestion Failover Runbook integrates with security incident response.
What lineage metadata do you capture to support audit requirements?

sections.title: Cross-System Dependencies and Risk
sections.goal: Explore multi-hop dependencies between Helios Datalake and other systems, and their security implications.
sample_questions: Can you explain how Helios interacts with Quasar Billing for cost allocation and the security controls in place?
How do you reconcile schema evolution from Borealis ETL with downstream data consumers?
Have you encountered a scenario where a Kafka ingestion change impacted IAM or Observability subsystems?

sections.title: Incident Handling and Tradeoffs
sections.goal: Evaluate decision-making in high-pressure situations and tradeoffs between availability, security, and compliance.
sample_questions: Tell me about a time you had to choose between meeting SLA-HEL-01 and enforcing a security control.
How would you prioritize mitigation steps if an ingestion pipeline was compromised but data availability was critical?
What evidence (tickets, runbooks, RFCs) do you rely on to justify such tradeoffs?

sections.title: Forward-Looking Improvements
sections.goal: Identify potential enhancements to security posture and resilience in the data platform.
sample_questions: What changes would you propose to RB-ING-042 to better align with POL-SEC-001?
How could we improve partitioning strategies from RFC-1287 to reduce blast radius?
Which emerging tools or patterns could we adopt to strengthen secure data lineage tracking?
